title: C++ Types and EDIReplay

title: Advanced Git Techniques
description: Git add options with -u and update-index, using gdb with unittest debugging techniques, and git diff -w --diff-algorithm=minimal as the ultimate combo for effective comparisons.

description: FG_t and Cat04 old structure discussion, and Local Scoring covering how to use packages from other repositories and understanding dependency risks.

title: Cloud Analysis and Documentation
description: Cloud discrepancy between Hermes and EDIReplay analysis, and Copilot Agent instructions for doxygen conversion example.

title: Cloud Refresher - Part 1: Introduction and Core Concepts
description: Comprehensive cloud refresher session covering fundamental cloud concepts including regions, landing zones, PaaS, namespaces, pods, and containers. Introduction to cloud architecture, migration from traditional servers (NP/ARP) to cloud infrastructure, understanding the cloud hierarchy, and Edix support workflow. Covers the 'Keep Calm and Don't Panic' approach to cloud adoption and troubleshooting. Discussion of FQ satellite configuration and SI design considerations.

title: Cloud Refresher - Part 2: Logs, Monitoring and Production Practices
description: Second part of cloud refresher covering Applog usage in cloud environments, log analysis and system identification, Splunk integration for log indexing, understanding PaaS and namespace information in logs, production environment naming conventions, and cloud readiness assessment. Emphasis on using Edix support for issue tracking and improving cloud tooling. Practical demonstrations of ALF log analysis and identifying cloud deployment details.
